title: RTCPeerConnection: removeTrack() method
summary:
The
  RTCPeerConnection.removeTrack() method tells the local
  end of the connection to stop sending media from the specified track, without actually
  removing the corresponding RTCRtpSender from the list of senders as
  reported by RTCPeerConnection.getSenders(). If the track is
  already stopped, or is not in the connection's senders list, this method has no effect.
pageTitle: RTCPeerConnection: removeTrack() method - Web APIs | MDN
